Title: faq class should have an initializer
faq class should have a class method called "all" that returns the array of faq objects
data for the faq class should be stored in a yaml file and the "all" method should inflate it from that file
faq classes should be sortable (implement Comparable) and should be sorted by the lowercase version of the question
the anchor name should be calculated by removing whitespace and punctuation from the title and should be a method called "slug"
